channel.title: Free Compilers / IDEs
channel.description:
[b][i]IDEs with compiler:[/i][/b]
Microsoft .NET Express Editions (VB.NET, C#.NET, C++.NET, ASP.NET and Silverlight): http://www.microsoft.com/express/download/
Lazarus (Pascal): http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=89339
SharpDevelop (VB.NET, C#.NET, Boo.NET): http://www.icsharpcode.net/OpenSource/SD/Download/
Dev-C++ (C/C++): http://www.bloodshed.net/devcpp.html
MinGW (C/C++): http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=2435
Code::Blocks (C/C++): http://www.codeblocks.org/downloads
NetBeans (Java, C/C++, PHP, JavaScript, Groovy, Python, and Ruby): http://www.netbeans.org/downloads/index.html
Eclipse (Java, C/C++, PHP and Ada): http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition (Java, Ruby and JavaScript): http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/index.html
MonoDevelop (C/C++, C#, Java, Boo, VB.NET, CIL, Python, and Vala): http://monodevelop.com/Download
[i][b]Compilers[/b][/i]
Free Pascal (Pascal): http://www.freepascal.org/download.var
GCC (C++): http://gcc.gnu.org/
[i]If you know of any other good, freeware IDEs/compilers, PM me and I'll add em.[/i]

item.title: Free Compilers / IDEs
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

IDEs with compiler:

Microsoft .NET Express Editions (VB.NET, C#.NET, C++.NET, ASP.NET and Silverlight): http://www.microsoft.com/express/download/

Eclipse (Java, C/C++, PHP and Ada): http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/

IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition (Java, Ruby and JavaScript): http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/index.html

MonoDevelop (C/C++, C#, Java, Boo, VB.NET, CIL, Python, and Vala): http://monodevelop.com/Download

If you know of any other good, freeware IDEs/compilers, PM me and Iâ€™ll add em.
